text.section:
The applicant shall be exempt from:
The required hours of supervised experience in the practice of counseling set out in KRS 335.525(1)(e); and
The examination requirement set out in KRS 335.525(1)(f).

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000.
